FROM accupara/ubuntu:16.04
MAINTAINER Crave.io Inc. "contact@crave.io"

RUN sudo apt-get update && \
    sudo apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
        autoconf \
        automake \
        clang \
        perl && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
